trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_000<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day to you)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day to you)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. How may I help you?

TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_010<tab>Good <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day to you)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day to you)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. You have received all the accolades one might possibly earn from the Resistance, but if there is aught else I can do for you...
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A1_000_000<tab>Proof of mettle exchange.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A1_000_001<tab>Resistance honors exchange.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A1_000_002<tab>Inquire about Resistance honors.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A1_000_010<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_100<tab>My apologies, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, but you are no longer eligible to receive proofs of mettle.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_101<tab>I am afraid there are only so many honors one soldier can receive.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_110<tab>My apologies, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, but you do not presently meet the requirements to receive proofs of mettle.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_SYSTEM_000_111<tab>At least <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> mettle is required to receive proofs of mettle.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_120<tab>You wish to receive proofs of mettle? Then let us have a look at your combat records.

TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_Q2_000_000<tab>You have currently amassed <var 22 E802 ((,)) /var> mettle. Expend <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var> mettle to receive <var 20 E804 /var> proof<var 08 E2E80402 (()) ((s)) /var> of mettle?
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_130<tab>A reward well earned, I must say.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_135<tab>When you have made your decision, speak with me again that we might discuss which honors you wish to receive.

TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_140<tab>Though I have not witnessed it with my own eyes, I have heard tales of what one might accomplish with the blessings of these accolades. You would do well to earn more if greater glory on the battlefield is what you seek.

TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_145<tab>There is not a soldier in all of the Resistance that has yet to hear of your accomplishments. Indeed, our historians are quite eager to chronicle the ventures of Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, war hero and liberator of Bozja.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_210<tab>Excellent! Which honors do you wish to receive?
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_Q3_000_000<tab>Which Resistance honors will you receive? (Proof<var 08 E2E80202 (()) ((s)) /var> of Mettle: <var 20 E802 /var>)
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A3_000_000<tab>Sun of Fortitude (<var 20 E802 /var>/<var 20 E803 /var>) | Required Proof<var 08 E2E80402 (()) ((s)) /var> of Mettle: <var 20 E804 /var>
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A3_000_001<tab>Sun of Valor (<var 20 E802 /var>/<var 20 E803 /var>) | Required Proof<var 08 E2E80402 (()) ((s)) /var> of Mettle: <var 20 E804 /var>
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A3_000_002<tab>Sun of Succor (<var 20 E802 /var>/<var 20 E803 /var>) | Required Proof<var 08 E2E80402 (()) ((s)) /var> of Mettle: <var 20 E804 /var>
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_A3_000_010<tab>Return
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_230<tab>My apologies, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, but you require more proofs of mettle to receive such an honor.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_061<tab>If you have amassed sufficient mettle, we may speak again about any additional proofs you require.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_Q4_000_000<tab>Receive a Sun of Fortitude in exchange for <var 20 E802 /var> proof<var 08 E2E80202 (()) ((s)) /var> of mettle?
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_Q4_000_001<tab>Receive a Sun of Valor in exchange for <var 20 E802 /var> proof<var 08 E2E80202 (()) ((s)) /var> of mettle?
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_Q4_000_002<tab>Receive a Sun of Succor in exchange for <var 20 E802 /var> proof<var 08 E2E80202 (()) ((s)) /var> of mettle?
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_250<tab>Yes, this is the requisite number of proofs. On behalf of the Resistance, it is my honor and privilege to award you this Resistance honor.

TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_251<tab>May it offer you the courage and protection needed to overcome all who would oppose you, and serve to enhearten those who might fight at your side.

TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_270<tab>If I am not mistaken, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, you have now received all honors one might earn in service to the Resistance.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_271<tab>In all my time with the Resistance, no soldier has shown such dedication to our cause.

TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_RESISTANCECOUNCILOR_000_272<tab>We could never hope to repay all you have done for us, but know that, so long as Bozja stands, her people shall never forget the hero to whom they owe their freedom.
TEXT_CTSMYCMEDAL_00719_SYSTEM_000_273<tab>You have been awarded full honors for your contributions to the Resistance!
